bug.author: znation
bug.summary: Box plot broken - no plot area displays
bug.description:
Seems to have broken with a recent release; probably due to Vega version incompatibility with our spec. Need to investigate further. Repro steps: The box plot example code from <denchmark-link:https://apple.github.io/turicreate/docs/userguide/vis/gallery.html>https://apple.github.io/turicreate/docs/userguide/vis/gallery.html</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5673251/47829359-5cd86400-dd44-11e8-88d8-062f3e1ef16e.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment:
Heat Map is also broken: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5673251/48171286-248ad580-e2b0-11e8-8d5a-da3b98e19f85.png></denchmark-link>
But Scatter Plot seems fine.
Heat Map is tracked separately in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apple/turicreate/issues/1129>#1129</denchmark-link> .
